StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetXmlParEval]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@TrainingEvalID uniqueidentifier
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT e.ID ,TrainingFileID ,EvalTypeID ,Es.matedDate ,CompletedDate ,ExamScore ,Comment ,LastUpdatedDate ,LastUpdatedBy ,SignatureID AS "Signature/SignatureID" ,U1.FirstName AS "Signature/SignatureFirstName" ,U1.MiddleName AS "Signature/SignatureMiddleName" ,U1.LastName AS "Signature/SignatureLastName" ,(SELECT t.ID ,TrainingEvalID ,TaskGroupID ,g.Title AS "GroupTitle" ,Name AS "TaskName" ,Descrip.on ,CanPerform ,LastUpdatedDate ,LastUpdatedBy FROM USMC.TrainingEvalTask AS t INNER JOIN USMC.TrainingEvalTaskGroup g ON t.TaskGroupID = g.ID WHERE t.TrainingEvalID = e.ID ORDER BY TaskGroupID, name FOR XML PATH('TrainingEvalTask'), TYPE, ELEMENTS XSINIL ) AS TrainingEvalTasks
FROM USMC.TrainingEvalua.on e LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissUserMgmtUser AS U1 ON U1.UserID = e.SignatureID WHERE e.ID = @TrainingEvalID FOR XML PATH('TrainingEvalua.on'), root('TrainingEvalua.ons'), ELEMENTS XSINIL
END
